document_data.name: Starander's Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''Starander's Hall''' was a great hall in [[Castle Obarskyr]].
document_data.Location: It was the way to the [[Room of the Watchful Sentinel]], which was as an antechamber to it.
document_data.History: Starander's Hall was a reference landmark for [[Storm Silverhand]], one of the [[Seven Sisters]], and her comrade the fugitive [[wizard]] [[Elminster Aumar]], when they sought the [[Dalestride Portal]] in [[Castle Obarskyr]] in {{yearlink|1479}}.
